entries.original: https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1626 to ensure shell commands spawned by Codex get `SIGTERM` when `codex` is killed (Linux only)
entries.translated: Codex에 의해 생성된 셸 명령어가 `codex`가 종료될 때 `SIGTERM`을 받도록 보장 (Linux 전용) https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1626

entries.original: Do not auto-approve certain flags for ripgrep/`rg` https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1644
entries.translated: ripgrep/`rg`에 대한 특정 플래그를 자동 승인하지 않음 https://github.com/openai/codex/pull/1644
